scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env APP_ENV=production next start
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev && cross-env APP_ENV=development next start
scripts.start:qa: npm run build:qa && cross-env APP_ENV=qa next start
scripts.build:docker: docker build --rm -t $npm_package_name-img -f ./Dockerfile . && docker tag $npm_package_name-img $npm_package_dockerURL:$npm_package_version  && docker push $npm_package_dockerURL:$npm_package_version && docker rmi -f $npm_package_name-img
scripts.build:docker:dev: docker build --rm -t $npm_package_name-img-dev -f ./Dockerfile.dev . && docker tag $npm_package_name-img-dev $npm_package_dockerURL:$npm_package_version-dev  && docker push $npm_package_dockerURL:$npm_package_version-dev && docker rmi -f $npm_package_name-img-dev
scripts.build:docker:qa: docker build --rm -t $npm_package_name-img-qa -f ./Dockerfile.qa . && docker tag $npm_package_name-img-qa $npm_package_dockerURL:$npm_package_version-qa  && docker push $npm_package_dockerURL:$npm_package_version-qa && docker rmi -f $npm_package_name-img-qa
